Name: Copy Mask
LongDescription: Earns Exp. Points every time the Pokémon takes damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Mime Jr. and Mr. Mime.  You can get a Copy Mask at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Junior Beam, a Junior Card, and a Mimic Pebble. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
